projects.title: AMW - Social Network & Game
projects.intro: Although this project was discontinued, I did manage back then to raise a huge community related to Anime, Manga, Cosplay, Gaming.
responsabilities: This was a social network similar to Facebook & google plus
A small enjoyable game as part of the network, that when you interact you would earn points to build your customized character.
Each character could be customized any way you would like it to be, while no limits were added such as for levels, enchancements and so on.
Included various of features such as auction, ads system similar to facebook, character interaction as RPG, publish your own creations, chats and more
Furthermore can be discussed about this project
